description:
Students who enroll in this course will learn the most important formulas in MS Excel 2013 (also Microsoft excel 2007 , excel 2010 and excel 2016) as well as using them in the most efficient way. Moreover the course offers an excel vba section where students learn to program very useful vba code.

I designed the course in a way which offers students with different excel knowledge the perfect environment to increase their skills and become proficient with one of the most important tools microsoft has to offer.

I use Excel 2013 but other versions of excel could be used to. The course is structured in more than 50 Excel Tutorials with almost 3 hours of valuable content. Any student can decide on his/her own how fast he or she wants to complete the course.Learning MS Excel in no time is possible).

Whether you want to work in the banking sector, in consulting, in an industrial company or as an entrepreneur - as long as you want to work with excel, this course offers the best way to hone your skills.

If the course is not helpful to you than you can use a 30 day money back guarantee. But I promise you find what you are looking for. Let's learn Excel together.

I am looking forward to working with you. See you in the first lecture.
title: Master MS Excel 2013 - Formulas and VBA programming
